> [rythyrix](#comment_114_18eGWSaM3Vc9i61LVfogjQJf5gp7EN7b9Y): Pseudonymous. If you're connecting via clearnet, or using Tor-only mode but not using a browser configured to route all traffic through Tor, then it is fairly easy to suss out who a given IP addr is. ZN assigns a peer ID to itself whenever a non-Tor connection is solicited. [...]

Yes, you are correct. Just be careful before you publish something sensitive.
